title: Yowamushi Pedal
description: A timid, anime-loving teen gets drawn into a school cycling club, where his new friends help him face tough challenges to develop his racing talent.

title: Pokémon Master Journeys: The Series
description: As Ash battles his way through the World Coronation Series, Goh continues his quest to catch every Pokémon. Together, they're on a journey to adventure!

title: Kuroko's Basketball
description: Five middle school basketball stars went to separate high schools, and now Tetsuya Kuroko and Seirin High are making their play for glory.

title: EDENS ZERO
description: Aboard the Edens Zero, a lonely boy with the ability to control gravity embarks on an adventure to meet the fabled space goddess known as Mother.

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
description: After experiencing "puberty syndrome" himself, high school pariah Sakuta keeps meeting girls suffering from it, including his sister and actor Mai.

title: SHAMAN KING
description: Medium Yoh Asakura enters a battle tournament held every 500 years, competing with other shamans in a bid to become the all-powerful Shaman King.

title: Darwin’s Game
description: High schooler Kaname activates a mysterious mobile app and unwittingly joins a game pitting players with supernatural abilities against each other.

title: Hunter X Hunter (2011)
description: To fulfill his dreams of becoming a legendary Hunter like his dad, a young boy must pass a rigorous examination and find his missing father.

title: Transformers: War for Cybertron: Kingdom
description: The frantic race to locate the Allspark first culminates on a strange planet as the future comes crashing through to the present day.

title: Revelations: The Masters of the Universe: Revelation Aftershow
description: Take a behind-the-scenes look at “Masters of the Universe: Revelation” as showrunner Kevin Smith and others interview the cast about their iconic roles.

title: BEASTARS
description: In a world where beasts of all kinds coexist, a gentle wolf awakens to his own predatory urges as his school deals with a murder within its midst.

title: RESIDENT EVIL: Infinite Darkness
description: Years after the horrors of Raccoon City, Leon and Claire find themselves consumed by a dark conspiracy when a viral attack ravages the White House.

title: Sailor Moon Crystal
description: Middle schooler Usagi Tsukino and her friends learn that they have the power to transform into Sailor Guardians, protecting the world from darkness.

title: Legend of Exorcism
description: After leaving Yaojin Palace, Kong Hongjun arrives in Chang'an to battle demons and forms a bond with exorcism squad chief Li Jinglong.

title: The Daily Life of the Immortal King
description: Having vanquished a powerful demon at age six, precocious wizard Wang Ling must now navigate high school life as an ordinary teen.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
description: When a kingdom is taken over by tyrants, the deposed princess begins a quest to find a disbanded group of evil knights to help take back her realm.

title: Godzilla Singular Point
description: Brought together by a mysterious song, a grad student and an engineer lead the fight against an unimaginable force that may spell doom for the world.

title: Record of Ragnarok
description: Before eradicating humankind from the world, the gods give them one last chance to prove themselves worthy of survival. Let the Ragnarok battles begin.

title: Trese
description: In Manila, where dark supernatural forces pervade the criminal underworld, it’s up to Alexandra Trese to keep the peace — but there’s a storm brewing.

title: Attack on Titan
description: With his hometown in ruins, young Eren Yeager becomes determined to fight back against the giant Titans that threaten to destroy the human race.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
description: New student Haruhi stumbles on the Ouran High School Host Club, an all-male group that makes money by entertaining the girls of the school.

title: Eden
description: A human girl secretly raised by robots starts to uncover the dark secrets behind her lush, utopian world where humanity has all but vanished.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: Multiple generations of the Joestar family – all with the same nickname – confront supernatural villains through a series of time periods.

title: The Mystic River
description: As pregnant women vanish in a remote Nigerian village over decades, a doctor with child finds herself extremely close to uncovering dangerous secrets.

title: Castlevania
description: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly beasts controlled by Dracula himself. Inspired by the classic video games.

title: Yasuke
description: A peaceful boatman once known as the Black Samurai is pulled back into conflict when he takes a little girl with mysterious powers under his wing.

title: Bakugan: Geogan Rising
description: The Awesome Brawlers band together to fight off a powerful enemy determined to break the bond between Earth and Vestroia, the Bakugan's home planet.

title: Durarara!!
description: A young man looking for excitement moves to Ikebukuro, a district in Tokyo, where he finds a world of mystery in which the past and present mesh.

title: High-Rise Invasion
description: High schooler Yuri finds herself atop a skyscraper in a strange world, where she must survive against masked assailants bent on killing their prey.

title: Sonic X
description: A mission gone awry transports Sonic the Hedgehog, his friends, Dr. Eggman and the Chaos Emeralds to another dimension: Earth.

title: Slasher
description: Rampaging serial killers leave carnage in their wake as their next victims fight to stay alive in this horror anthology series.

title: Heaven Official's Blessing
description: Banished to the mortal realm to exorcise ghosts, a deity must reckon with a demon and soon uncovers a dark secret behind the heavenly gods.

title: The Way of the Househusband
description: After disappearing from the underworld, the legendary yakuza Tatsu, "the Immortal Dragon," resurfaces — as a fiercely devoted stay-at-home husband.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
description: The lives of young Yugi Moto and his friends Joey, Tristan, and Téa are forever changed when a fantasy card game becomes their reality.

title: DOTA: Dragon's Blood
description: A conflicted yet courageous Dragon Knight must use the power of the dragon within to stop a deadly demon in this epic fantasy based on the online game.

title: B: The Beginning
description: Genius investigator Keith Flick rejoins the royal police force just as serial killer "B" emerges. Mysterious youth Koku may be an ally, or a target.

title: Pokémon Journeys: The Series
description: Young trainer Ash and his new friend Goh become research fellows at Professor Cerise's laboratory, traveling all over the world to learn about Pokémon.

title: Pacific Rim: The Black
description: After Kaiju ravage Australia, two siblings pilot a Jaeger to search for their parents, encountering new creatures, seedy characters and chance allies.

title: TIGER & BUNNY
description: In an alternate New York City protected by a band of superheroes called NEXT, veteran Wild Tiger is forced to team up with rookie Barnaby Brooks Jr.

title: Thus Spoke Kishibe Rohan
description: A popular manga creator becomes enmeshed in paranormal events while conducting research: Stand User Kishibe Rohan visits Italy, goes bankrupt and more.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: After a demon attack leaves his family slain and his sister cursed, Tanjiro embarks upon a perilous journey to find a cure and avenge those he's lost.

title: The Idhun Chronicles
description: A boy suddenly orphaned fights his parents' killer to save a planet, and discovers a new world of danger — and wonder.

title: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina
description: Magic and mischief collide as half-human, half-witch Sabrina navigates between two worlds: mortal teen life and her family's legacy, the Church of Night.

title: Transformers: War for Cybertron: Earthrise
description: While Megatron takes drastic measures to save the Decepticons, the Autobots fight to save all of Cybertron from both on the planet and aboard the Ark.

title: Marvel Anime: Wolverine
description: Logan, aka mutant X-Man Wolverine, is on a quest to reclaim the love of his life – whose crime lord father is planning an arranged marriage for her.

title: Marvel Anime: X-Men
description: A year after their dissolution, the X-Men are re-assembled by Professor Charles Xavier to investigate the kidnapping of young mutants in Japan.

title: The Guest
description: Bound together by a tragic past, a psychic, a priest and a detective join forces to take down a powerful spirit that's driven by bloodthirst.

title: Great Pretender
description: Supposedly Japan's greatest swindler, Makoto Edamura gets more than he bargained for when he tries to con Laurent Thierry, a real world-class crook.

title: Beyblade Burst Rise
description: After training with legendary Valt Aoi, Dante and his trusty Ace Dragon lead the next generation of Bladers to battle in Japan — Beyblade's birthplace.

title: American Horror Story
description: This twisted Emmy-winning drama plays upon the power of supernatural fears and everyday horrors, exploring humankind's unsettling capacity for evil.

title: Bakugan: Armored Alliance
description: Dan Kouzo and his crew of heroic brawlers battle both challengers and powerful, evil forces as they work to protect humans and the Bakugan.

title: Bakugan: Battle Planet
description: Dan Kouzo and his pals bond with mysterious creatures known as Bakugan while fighting sinister forces out to control the world.

title: Blood of Zeus
description: A commoner living in ancient Greece, Heron discovers his true heritage as a son of Zeus, and his purpose: to save the world from a demonic army.

title: Food Wars!: Shokugeki no Soma
description: Young chef Soma enters the prestigious Totsuki Culinary Academy, where he must emerge victorious in over-the-top cooking battles or face expulsion.

title: Sword Art Online
description: A video game whiz helps create a new technology that enables players to guide their online avatars with their own bodies – but a dark twist emerges.

title: Black Butler
description: In Victorian London, 12-year-old business magnate Ciel Phantomhive thwarts dangers to the queen as he's watched over by his demon butler, Sebastian.

title: Dragon's Dogma
description: Resurrected as an Arisen, Ethan sets out to vanquish the Dragon that took his heart. But with every demon he battles, his humanity slips further away.

title: Blue Exorcist
description: Determined to throw off the curse of being Satan's illegitimate son, Rin enters the True Cross Academy to become an exorcist, just like his mentor.

title: Erased
description: Satoru Fujinuma can travel back in time to save others' lives. When he wakes up 18 years in the past, he has a chance to save his murdered classmates.

title: The Promised Neverland
description: When three gifted kids learn that their isolated orphanage isn’t the haven they thought, they vow to lead the other children in a risky escape plan.

title: Aggretsuko
description: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

title: Goedam
description: When night falls on the city, shadows and spirits come alive in this horror anthology series centered on urban legends.

title: Zoids Wild
description: A quest for freedom and legendary treasure begins when a cheerful young adventurer follows his father's footsteps to become the greatest Zoids hunter.

title: Nagi-Asu: A Lull in the Sea
description: In a world where humans are divided between the land and the sea, four childhood friends from the ocean must attend middle school on the surface.

title: Toradora!
description: Menacing in appearance but gentle at heart, Ryūji forms an unlikely friendship with Taiga, a tiny girl with a sharp tongue and a tough attitude.

title: Transformers: War For Cybertron Trilogy
description: As the Autobots and Decepticons ravage their planet in a brutal civil war, two iconic leaders emerge in the Transformers universe's origin story.

title: Japan Sinks: 2020
description: After catastrophic earthquakes devastate Japan, one family's resolve is tested on a journey of survival through the sinking archipelago.

title: JU-ON: Origins
description: A paranormal researcher searches obsessively for a cursed home where something terrible happened to a mother and her child long ago.

title: BNA
description: Morphed into a raccoon beastman, Michiru seeks refuge, and answers, with the aid of wolf beastman Shirou inside the special zone of Anima-City.

title: ONE PIECE
description: Monkey D. Luffy sails with his crew of Straw Hat Pirates through the Grand Line to find the treasure One Piece and become the new king of the pirates.

title: Reality Z
description: With Rio de Janeiro under a zombie attack, reality show contestants shelter in a TV studio, where they must deal with more than flesh-eating hordes.

title: BAKI
description: While martial arts champion Baki Hanma trains hard to surpass his legendary father, five violent death row inmates descend upon Tokyo to take him on.

title: Cardcaptor Sakura
description: After a young girl breaks the seal of a magical book, releasing the spirits of the cards inside, she must become a "Cardcaptor" and retrieve them.

title: Megalobox
description: Created for the 50th anniversary of manga "Ashita No Joe," mechanized human fighters known as Megalo Boxers battle each other for boxing supremacy.

title: Dorohedoro
description: Amnesiac Caiman seeks to undo his lizard head curse by killing the sorcerer responsible, with his friend Nikaido's help. In the Hole, that's a threat.

title: Parasyte: The Maxim
description: A teenager battles an onslaught of parasites from space with help from Migi, a docile parasitic creature that's taken over his right hand.

title: Strangers from Hell
description: Unpleasant events disturb the life of an aspiring crime fiction writer when he becomes a resident of an apartment building teeming with shady neighbors.

title: Monthly Girls' Nozaki Kun
description: Art imitates life when Chiyo discovers her crush is a famous artist who wants to use their budding relationship as inspiration for his romantic manga.

title: DRIFTING DRAGONS
description: Dragons are on the menu as the crew of the airship Quin Zaza sets out on a hunt. If they fail, empty stomachs will be the least of their worries.

title: Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045
description: After a global financial crisis, the world is engulfed in an AI-driven "sustainable war." It's up to Section 9 to counter new forms of cyber threats.

title: Bleach
description: After teenager Ichigo Kurosaki acquires superpowers from wounded soul reaper Rukia Kuchiki, the two of them join forces to round up lost souls.

title: Hi Score Girl
description: A chronic gamer abysmally inept in academics and sports finally meets his match at his usual shady arcade – and it’s his rich classmate, Akira.

title: Pokémon the Series
description: Ash and his Pikachu travel to the Alola region with his mother and enroll in the Pokémon school, where they confront the nefarious Team Skull.

title: Saint Seiya
description: A band of young warriors in magical armor vow to defend the reincarnation of Greek goddess Athena against evil forces and to return her to the throne.

title: 7SEEDS
description: Shy Natsu awakens as part of a group chosen to ensure the survival of humanity. Together, they have to survive on a changed Earth.

title: Dino Girl Gauko
description: When she gets angry, middle schooler Naoko turns into fierce dinosaur Gauko! Thanks to friends, aliens and more, her life is full of wacky incidents.

title: Bloodride
description: The doomed passengers aboard a spectral bus head toward a gruesome, unknown destination in this deliciously macabre horror anthology series.

title: Akame ga Kill!
description: Tatsumi sets out on a journey to help his poor village. When he's rescued by a band of assassins, he joins their fight against the corrupt government.

title: Spectros
description: A group of teens get caught up in a supernatural clash as vengeful spirits from centuries past rise up in the Liberdade district of São Paulo.

title: Cagaster of an Insect Cage
description: Thirty years after a disease that turns the infected into carnivorous insects emerged, a young exterminator and a teenage girl search for her mother.

title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
description: Lovable goof Bell Cranel wants an adventure, and when he meets the diminutive goddess Hestia, he gets much more than he bargained for.

title: No Game No Life
description: Legendary gamer siblings Sora and Shiro are transported to a world where life is a series of games and humanity is in grave danger of extinction.

title: Pop Team Epic
description: This animated adaptation of the quirky four-panel comic brings the random exploits of Popuko and Pipimi to life.

title: ​SAINT SEIYA: Knights of the Zodiac
description: Seiya and the Knights of the Zodiac rise again to protect the reincarnation of the goddess Athena, but a dark prophecy hangs over them all.

title: Soul Eater
description: Maka and the other students at the Death Weapon Meister Academy must kill 99 evil humans and one witch, absorbing their spirits when they die.

title: Cells at Work!
description: One newcomer red blood cell just wants to do her job. Between bacteria incursions and meeting a certain white blood cell, she's got a lot to learn!

title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.: Reawakened
description: Kusuo and his gaggle of self-proclaimed friends are back for more psychic mishaps. If he didn't have enough problems before, he's got even more now.

title: CAROLE & TUESDAY
description: Part-timer Carole meets rich girl Tuesday, and each realizes they've found the musical partner they need. Together, they just might make it.

title: Girls und Panzer
description: Miho Nishizumi tries to escape her family's tradition of tankery by enrolling at a new high school. Instead she gets back into the sport with friends.

title: Teasing Master Takagi-san
description: Teased constantly by classmate Takagi-san, middle-schooler Nishikata swears payback by trying (and failing) to give her a dose of her own medicine.

title: Nightflyers
description: With humankind's future at stake, a group of scientists and a powerful telepath venture into the void aboard a spaceship full of secrets.

title: Levius
description: Young Levius rises through the ranks in the brutal world of metal boxing under his uncle's guidance. Forces outside the ring have their eye on him.

title: K-On!
description: When they're not gorging themselves on sugary snacks, four aspiring high school musicians crank out catchy tunes as members of the Light Music Club.

title: CLANNAD
description: Maladjusted high school student Tomoya's life begins to change when he befriends his classmate Nagisa and several other eccentric girls.

title: Haikyu!!
description: Inspired by a championship match he sees on TV, junior high schooler Hinata joins a volleyball club and begins training, despite his short height.

title: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions!
description: High schooler Yuta wants to leave his past as a delusional weirdo behind. But his classmate Rikka has her own delusions, and she's interested in his.

title: Maid-Sama!
description: To keep the boys in line, student council president Misaki runs the school with an iron fist – while secretly working as a waitress at a maid café.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans
description: On a terraformed post-disaster Mars, a group of child security agents rebel against the adults who betrayed them and the oppressive Earth government.

title: KENGAN ASHURA
description: Ohma Tokita enters a hidden world where corporate disputes are settled in brutal gladiator bouts. Forget the money, he just wants to fight – and win.

title: Beyblade Burst Turbo
description: Yearning to earn the title of world blading champion, a novice competitor must harness his untamed potential through training and tournaments.

title: Ultramarine Magmell
description: Decades after the sudden birth of a new continent, a young rescuer-for-hire provides aid to adventurers exploring this dangerous, uncharted world.

title: Seis Manos
description: Orphans raised by a martial arts master are plunged into a mystery involving demonic powers, drug cartels, ancient rituals and blood sacrifice.

title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress: The Battle of Unato
description: Ikoma and the Iron Fortress take their fight to the battlegrounds of Unato, joining the alliance to reclaim the region from the kabane horde.

title: Naruto
description: Guided by the spirit demon within him, orphaned Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.

title: HERO MASK
description: After a rash of mysterious deaths, Crown prosecutor Sarah Sinclair and SSC agent James Blood discover a conspiracy surrounding uncanny new bio-masks.

title: Cannon Busters
description: Immortal renegade Philly the Kid and his transforming pink Cadillac join a relentlessly upbeat friendship droid on her quest to find a missing prince.

title: Typewriter
description: Three young friends in Goa plan to search an old villa for ghosts, but when a new family moves in, the home’s buried past resurfaces in chilling ways.

title: Angel Beats!
description: In a high school that's a way station to the afterlife, a teenager gets caught up in the battle for the rights of those in this purgatorial world.

title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
description: A teen haunted by the spirit of an old friend summons the other members of their childhood club to help fulfill the girl's final wish.

title: God Eater
description: An enemy immune to conventional arms has caused the collapse of civilization and humanity's only hope lies in a new living weapon: the God Arc.

title: GRANBLUE FANTASY the Animation
description: In a world where islands float in the sky, Gran encounters a mysterious girl wanted by the Erste Empire for her ability to summon Primal Beasts.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

title: Record of Grancrest War
description: Lone mage Siluca wanders the land of Atlatan, disgusted by its greedy nobility. When she meets knight errant Theo, she sees a chance to create peace.

title: Forest of Piano
description: Kai grows up playing an old piano discarded in the woods; Shuhei's father is a famous pianist. Their chance meeting transforms their lives and music.

title: Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic
description: A land of mysterious ruins and a magical treasure hunt await young Aladdin and his courageous friend Alibaba for the adventure of their lives.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Fifteen years after the Second Impact, Shinji Ikari joins his father's group NERV as one of several teenage mecha pilots fighting the monstrous Angels.

title: Fate/Zero
description: After three unsettled battles for the mystical Holy Grail, an artifact that grants a miracle to those who hold it, a fourth war begins.

title: Kill la Kill
description: The "woman with the scissor blade" – Ryuko Matoi – searches for clues all around the world for the truth behind her father's death.

title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
description: One day, Madoka Kaname has a very magical encounter, one that can change her destiny. This is the beginning of the new story of magical witch girls.

title: March Comes in Like a Lion
description: Orphaned young, a reclusive 17-year-old professional shogi player starts to come out of his shell when three sisters take him under their wing.

title: Revisions
description: When Shibuya time-warps to 2388, high schooler Daisuke and his friends are conscripted by AHRV agent Milo to fight the hostile cyborg race, revisions.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
description: A high-schooler who's granted powers to make anyone instantly obedient dons a mask to lead Japan's rebellion against a long-invading Britannia.

title: Ingress: The Animation
description: After scientists discover a mysterious substance that can influence human minds, two factions wage an all-out battle to control its awesome power.

title: Chambers
description: Haunted by eerie visions and sinister impulses after a heart transplant, a teenager tries to unmask the truth behind her donor's mysterious death.

title: Rilakkuma and Kaoru
description: Her life might be a little mundane, but Kaoru gets to go home to Rilakkuma, her endearingly lazy roommate who happens to be a fuzzy toy bear.

title: Ultraman
description: Decades ago, a hero from the stars left this world in peace. Now, the son of Ultraman must rise to protect the Earth from a new alien threat.

title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
description: High school sophomore Kusuo Saiki swore as a child that he would keep his psychic talents hidden, but his abilities still make his life difficult.

title: The Kirlian Frequency
description: In the midnight hour, a lone DJ broadcasts the strangest – and scariest – tales from the outer edges of Kirlian, a lost city somewhere in Argentina.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: The war is over, and Violet Evergarden needs a job. Scarred and emotionless, she takes a job as a letter writer to understand herself and her past.

title: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online
description: College student Karen takes up Gun Gale Online and gets a reputation as the Pink Demon. Then her gaming buddy Pitohui asks her to join the Squad Jam.

title: LAST HOPE
description: After causing the near extinction of mankind seven years ago, genius scientist Leon Lau must now fight the ecological disaster he unwittingly created.

title: Sirius the Jaeger
description: In imperial Tokyo, a group calling themselves "Jaegers" secretly hunt the vampires seeking the Ark of Sirius. Among them is young werewolf, Yuliy.

title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
description: High school students Rin and Shiro pair up as allies when they're chosen to compete in a secret tournament for possession of the Holy Grail.

title: Back Street Girls -GOKUDOLS-
description: To pay for an epic blunder, three yakuza brothers are forced to alter their bodies, form a girl group and break into the underground J-Pop idol scene.

title: Beyblade Burst Evolution
description: Scouted by a famous Spanish club, Valt Aoi heads to Spain. With their sights on the World League, he and his teammates face the European League first.

title: Fate/EXTRA Last Encore
description: Hakuno Kishinami finds himself in the midst of a Holy Grail war with no memories of how he got there. Through his confusion, he must fight to survive.

title: LOST SONG
description: War looms over the kingdom of Neunatia, where two young women are both burdened and blessed by the power of song.

title: Violet Evergarden: Special
description: Auto Memory Doll Violet Evergarden writes letters for people who can’t, learning about her war-torn country and her own hardened heart along the way.

title: DRAGON PILOT: Hisone & Masotan
description: Recently stationed Air Self-Defense Force rookie Hisone Amakasu is chosen by a dragon concealed within Gifu Air Base to be his pilot.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam UC
description: When Banagher Links meets the mysterious Audrey Burne, he inherits the Unicorn Gundam and is swept up into the battle for space colony independence.

title: SWORDGAI The Animation
description: A young man becomes host to a legendary infernal sword and, with the fate of humanity now in his arm, wields its demonic power against his enemies.

title: Dinosaur King
description: Aided by tablets found near a downed meteorite, Max, Rex and Zoe race the evil Alpha Gang as they travel the globe in search of living dinosaurs.

title: Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas
description: This anime adventure follows the battle between a saint of Athena and an avatar of Hades who's working on a painting that could destroy the world.

title: Children of the Whales
description: As a magic wielder, young archivist Chakuro knows his time is short, but everything changes when a girl from the outside appears on his island.

title: A.I.C.O.
description: Everything Aiko knew was a lie. Now she's joining a team of Divers to reach the place where the Burst began to stop it for good and save her family.

title: Devilman Crybaby
description: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
description: Brothers Edward and Alphonse use alchemy to resurrect their mother, but they unleash a chemical reaction that tears apart their bodies.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: After both suffer physical damage – brothers Edward and Alphonse battle nefarious forces to try to reclaim their bodies in this supernatural anime.

title: Pokémon: Indigo League
description: Explore the world of Pokémon with 10-year-old Ash Ketchum and his partner, Pikachu, as they aim for Ash's ultimate goal: becoming a Pokémon master.

title: The Irregular at Magic High School
description: Siblings Tatsuya and Miyuki enroll at Magic High School, where Miyuki's honors status comes between her and her underachieving older brother.

title: Glitter Force Doki Doki
description: Four girls summon their inner superheroes to defend Earth and the magical kingdom of Splendorius from King Mercenare and his minions.

title: Fate/Apocrypha
description: The theft of the Greater Grail from Fuyuki City leads to a splintered timeline in which the Great Holy Grail War is waged on an unprecedented scale.

title: ID-0
description: In the midst of a field exercise operating I-Machines, Alliance Academy student Maya Mikuri is thrown into an entirely different kind of adventure.

title: Beyblade Burst
description: Middle schooler Valt Aoi, with his Beyblade Valtryek, faces off against friends, classmates and rivals to become the world's number one Blader.

title: Dark Matter
description: After waking up aboard a derelict spaceship with no memories, the crew of the Raza investigates the mystery of their identities and destination.

title: Gurren Lagann
description: When a young laborer escapes to the world aboveground, he discovers a violent land in which humans battle robots controlled by a power-hungry noble.

title: Little Witch Academia
description: Akko enrolls at the Luna Nova Witchcraft Academy. She's not the best student, but her bright attitude is the key to her and her friends' success.

title: One-Punch Man
description: The most powerful superhero in the world can kill anyone with one blow. But nothing can challenge him, so he struggles with ennui and depression.

title: Cyborg 009: Call of Justice
description: Years after taking up normal lives incognito, the cyborgs are forced to fight again when the superhuman Blessed appear with a plan for humanity.

title: AJIN: Demi-Human
description: A teenager discovers that he is an Ajin and flees before the authorities experiment on him. Other Ajin plan to fight back and he must choose a side.

title: InuYasha
description: Yanked down a well, schoolgirl Kagome Higurashi emerges in feudal Japan, where she must reassemble a sacred jewel while eluding half-demon Inuyasha.

title: DEATH NOTE
description: When a Japanese high schooler comes into possession of a mystical notebook, he finds he has the power to kill anybody whose name he enters in it.

title: Vampire Knight
description: At Cross Academy, two student disciplinary committee members are tasked with keeping the peace between a human class and a night class of vampires.

title: Glitter Force
description: Five preteen girls learn they're a legendary superhero squad known as the Glitter Force. Their mission? To defend Earth from evil fairy-tale villains.

title: Kuromukuro
description: When mecha attack a research center, its students, pilots, and researchers must fight back with the help of mysterious artifacts and a young samurai.

title: Cyborg 009 VS Devilman
description: When a Black Ghost scientist releases newly modified cyborgs and mysterious demons appear in Tokyo, the worlds of "Devilman" and "Cyborg 009" meet.

title: Your lie in April
description: After his mother's death, a piano prodigy's will to play disappears. But meeting a free-spirited girl who plays the violin turns his life around.

title: Hemlock Grove
description: Secrets are just a part of daily life in the small Pennsylvania town of Hemlock Grove, where the darkest evils hide in plain sight.

title: Anjaan: Rural Myths
description: Spine-chilling stories of malevolent spirits unfold in villages, jungles and haunted buildings across India.

title: Anjaan: Special Crimes Unit
description: The cases are supernatural; the police officers human. Together, cops Aditi and Vikrant must solve mysteries from the realm of the paranormal.

title: 忍者ハットリくん
description: Hailing from the mountains of Iga, Kanzo Hattori moves in with elementary school student Kenichi Mitsuba and his family to hone his skills as a ninja.

title: Beyblade: Metal Fusion
description: In this anime adventure series for kids, the forces of good and evil "blade it out," battling each other with enchanted spinning tops.

title: Case Closed
description: Turned into a young boy by a sinister potion, teen sleuth Conan helps solve baffling crimes while tracking down the nefarious agents who poisoned him.

title: Darr Sabko Lagta Hai
description: In this chilling horror anthology series, actress and model Bipasha Basu meets people who have had disconcerting paranormal experiences.

title: Fairy Tail
description: When four young wizards team up to take jobs across the kingdom, they forge a bond more powerful than any magic and grow stronger with every mission.

title: Fear Files... Har Mod Pe Darr
description: Possessed lovers, witches, haunted houses and more bring tales of horror to the screen in this anthology series.

title: Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet
description: After falling through a wormhole, a space-dwelling teen mecha pilot awakes to find himself amid the inhabitants of a strange planet called ... Earth.

title: Gunslinger Girl
description: On the surface, the Social Welfare Agency appears to help orphaned schoolgirls, but it's actually turning them into lethal agents.

title: Hannibal
description: This drama series focuses on the early years of the relationship between FBI criminal profiler Will Graham and homicidal cannibal Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

title: Haven
description: Residents of Haven, Maine, are plagued by supernatural afflictions. To reveal the truth, FBI agent Audrey Parker must delve into her own strange past.

title: Helix
description: While investigating a possible outbreak at an Arctic research facility, scientists discover a new virus that could wipe out every human on the planet.

title: K
description: A young boy is wanted for a crime he has no recollection of committing and must go on the run, hunted by two powerful kings and their forces.

title: Knights of Sidonia
description: A hero rises to save a world that's also a spaceship under siege by an alien threat in this original anime series based on the popular manga comic.

title: Magi: Adventure of Sinbad
description: The Magi who became High King of the Seven Seas started as a boy determined to make the world a better place. He begins with a dangerous dungeon.

title: Ninja Hattori
description: Elementary school student Kenichi Mitsuba's household gains a surprising new member: Kanzo Hattori, a mischievous but helpful young ninja.

title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital
description: By night, teenage Rikuo becomes a form of demon called yokai, preparing to fulfill his destiny as the head of his legendary yokai clan.

title: Robotech
description: When a mysterious spaceship crashes in the Pacific, the people of Earth work to master the science of robotechnology and rebuild the giant fortress.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
description: A nomadic swordsman arrives at a martial arts school in Meiji-era Japan, where he lands in the middle of a conflict involving the opium trade.

title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer!
description: Thwarted in their attempt to take over the world of Ente Isla, Satan and his general Alciel land in modern-day Tokyo, where they take on human form.

title: The Twilight Zone (Original Series)
description: Hosted by creator Rod Serling, this groundbreaking anthology series presents tales of the supernatural that are often tinged with social commentary.

title: ThirTEEN Terrors
description: A group of teens searches for the dark truth behind their school's mysterious and brutal history.

title: Yo-Kai Watch
description: Nate frees a mythical being trapped in a magic capsule, and the two new friends have adventures with all sorts of troublesome supernatural creatures.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
description: Now that he's discovered the Pendulum Summoning technique, Yuya's dream of becoming the greatest "dueltainer" is in reach – but it won't be easy!
